forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 13C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High near 15C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 66F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 61F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 16C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 60F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 16C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 60F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 16C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 62F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 51F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies late. Low near 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
